message:
SYSTEM: MasterIA_Dic2009.pdf: Página 13
Semantic Measures
13
Semantic relatedness measure. Given R, E
rel: E x E →
such that:
Semantic similarity measure. Given RS, E
sim: E x E →
such that:
∀x, y ∈E, rel(x,y) ≥ 0
(positiveness)
∀x, y, z ∈E, rel(x,x) ≥ rel(y,z)
(maximality)
∀x, y ∈E, rel(x,y) = rel(y,x) 
(symmetry)
∀x, y ∈E, (x, y) ∉R, rel(x,y) = 0
∀x, y ∈E, sim(x,y) ≥ 0
(positiveness)
∀x, y, z ∈E, sim(x,x) ≥ sim(y,z)
(maximality)
∀x, y ∈E, sim(x,y) = sim(y,x) 
(symmetry)
∀x, y ∈E, (x, y) ∉RS, sim(x,y) = 0
speaker: SYSTEM
